nodes.text: Gen Con Game Fair 2001 was held on August 2 - 5, 2001 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. One of the largest and most prominent gaming conventions in North America, it included some Star Wars events, including an interactive Living Force adventure Blown Away and the Broken Orbits trilogy. A total of 258 individual roleplayers were involved in the trilogy, while more than 100 players took part in the interactive.

The Marked for Death tournament for 7th Sea CCG was also held during the event. The winner of the tournament marked many of the Gosse's Gentlemen faction for death, all but wiping out the known characters. You can learn more about 7th Sea CCG and the tournament at 7thSea.info.
